description: Context value object is recreated on every render, causing all consumers to re-render unnecessarily
steps: 1. Open React DevTools Profiler 2. Trigger any state change in AuthContext 3. Observe all consuming components re-render
expected: Context value should be memoized with useMemo
actual: Plain object literal in return causes new reference each render
impact: App-wide unnecessary re-renders on every auth state change

impact: Memory leak and React warning in console
